title: Zoe's Beatboxing Animation + Kinetic

embed.description: Check out an early, in-game look at League's newest mischief-maker Zoe: The Aspect of Twilight. Releasing in patch 7.23!

body: Now that Zoe is out on the PBE along with her Cyber Pop skin, I noticed, at least from the videos showing her off, that this little animation from the end of the teaser is MIA. Was this just for the teaser or is there some way to actually trigger her beatboxing to DJ Sona's Kinetic?

replies.body: That animation is actually one of her idles. If you don't move for a little while, she'll randomly start playing different idle animations. Hope you enjoy!! :)

is there any way to rig it up to play more often if there is a DJ Sona in the game, or is that too complicated of a thing to do for something that isn't going to make a difference in the quality of the champ?

I'm still trying to figure out if I like Zoe or if I hate her (will probably decide after playin with/against her), but I saw that animation in the skin spotlights and it's ADORABLE <3 <3 

{{sticker:sg-lux}}
I NEED TO KNOW THIS AS WELL THIS WAS SO ADORABLE TO SEE OMFG.
